messages: We're like snowflakes. Each of us is unique, but it's still pretty hard to tell us apart.
In life, no two days are the same for me. It's like a snowflake.
Every snowflake is unique, yet they are each perfect.
Love is like a snowflake, it can come to you in any shape or size, and from any direction.
Good friends are like snowflakes, all different and all beautiful.
The snowflake charm, be as unique as a snowflake: embrace all your dimensions.
A snowflake is winter's butterfly
Even the strongest blizzards start with a single snowflake.
Snowflakes are snow angels blowing kisses from heaven.
When I no longer thrill to the first snow of the season, I'll know I'm growing old.
Snowflakes are pretty patterns etched in water's dreams.
A snowball in the face is surely the perfect beginning to a lasting friendship.
Catching snowflakes on your tongue brings you back to childhood.
No snowflake ever falls in the wrong place.
Remember our souls are like snowflakes, all different and beautiful.
The snowflake never needs to feel responsible for the avalanche.
Even the strongest blizzards start with a single snowflake.
If hugs were snowflakes, I would send you a blizzard.
Sadly, my socks are like snowflakes, no two are exactly alike.
The weather might be frightful, but spending it with you is delightful.
